body: It's been literally years sense I've had any sort of punishment on the account and it goes straight to a 14 day-ban over tilting in a game? The hell is this shit. The punishment system has literally been reworked like twice since I have even had a slap on the wrist. How is it even remotely just to go straight to a 12 day ban over low level chat toxicity.

So what if you're not using it towards someone who is actually gay? I mean, if I'm understanding you correctly here, you're essentially also saying that calling a white person the N-word should be okay because they aren't actually black. You're still using it as an insult towards someone, effectively saying that being gay (or black) is a bad thing, which is completely unacceptable.


>Not to mention there are parts of the world where this game is played where that is literally commonly used to refer to cigarettes.

If someone truly used the word in this context, then it might be possible to contest the ban. However, in your case it's very obvious that you were not using it in that context, but rather using it as an insult.

Except it is also widely used as a generic insult. Synonymous with retard, bitch,%%%% and a billion other i could rattle off. An insult is an insult getting your panties in a bunch over a specific one is the epitome of retardation.

It is widely used as an insult, yes, but not a generic one. It is homophobic slur that is used to be insulting towards gays, even if you aren't directing towards a gay person. Because it is a slur meant to insult one's sexuality, it is indeed considered hate speech, and Riot has punished hate speech with an escalated 14 day ban since the implementation of the IFS a few years ago. It's okay if you don't like this, but this is Riot's game and ultimately they have the final say. 

As a side note to your "we have a mute button" argument, yes we do, but the mute button is NOT an excuse for players to harass others with no consequences. The mute button acts like a shield, we have it in case we need to protect ourselves from someone else attacking us, but that doesn't suddenly make it okay for that person to attack us in the first place.

Well, using it as an insult for whatever reason means that you are calling that person gay and saying that it's a bad thing. If you want to call someone stupid, ugly, idiotic, etc., then use those words instead, or better yet just don't insult people.

You are on NA servers, NA is not that place. Also based on the context it is obvious you weren't talking about a smoke. You are using a slur for homosexuals as an insult, that is a 14 day ban minimum.
